meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a moth
meanings.sent1: The noctuoid wings were delicate and covered in tiny scales.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with beautiful flowers attracting noctuoid insects.
meanings.sent3: The noctuoid costume at the party was a big hit!
meanings.sent4: Her graceful dance moves were as light as a noctuoid fluttering in the night.
meanings.sent5: The noctuoid patterns on the fabric glowed softly under the moonlight.

meanings.definition: A member of the superfamily Noctuoidea
meanings.sent1: The noctuoid flew silently through the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of the noctuoid to understand its role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The noctuoid's late-night meetings always made the other animals curious.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, the noctuoid was known as the mysterious wanderer.
meanings.sent5: The noctuoid's presence in the garden signaled the start of summer nights.
